Some things to consider for your job:
Paper thickness
measured in gsm (grams per square metre)

For example, paper with a weight of 55 gsm will be much, much lighter and thinner than paper weighing 400 gsm. The 400 gsm paper, meanwhile, will be heavy, thick, and much more durable.
Paper size

Starting at A0, each step up halves the paper in size. For example A4 is half the size of A3. The measurements of A4 are 210mm X 420mm
Single or double sided

Some products, like booklets, will needed be printed double sided. Otherwise it's up to you.
